content: Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role as maximum. However, you can change the role of individual users in the group after it has been successfully added.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when adding a group to a room, indicating that users can change individual roles in the group after it's been added successfully. The warning informs users about role changes allowed after initial group addition. It appears in the Invite Panel component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "وظيفة {{roleName}} كحد أقصى" (waẓīfat {{roleName}} ka ḥadd aqṣā) translates to 'function {{roleName}} as a maximum'. It would be more natural to say something like 'دور {{roleName}} كحد أقصى' (dawr {{roleName}} ka ḥadd aqṣā) which translates to 'role {{roleName}} as a maximum'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكن إضافة المجموعات إلى غرفة مع دور {{roleName}} كحد أقصى.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "وظائف المستخدمين الفرديين" (waẓā'if al-mustakhdimīn al-fardiyyīn) literally translates to 'functions of individual users'. It's more accurate and common to use 'أدوار المستخدمين الفرديين' (adwār al-mustakhdimīn al-fardiyyīn) which means 'roles of individual users'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكنك تغيير أدوار المستخدمين الفرديين في المجموعة بعد إضافتها بنجاح.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'qrupdakı fərdi istifadəçilərin rolunu' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: qrup içindəki istifadəçilərin rolu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'otaga' (into the room) could benefit from a more natural flow. It seems slightly abrupt in the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: otağa əlavə edilə bilər

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "могат да се добавят към стая" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "могат да бъдат добавени към стая" or "може да се добавят към стая".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Групи могат да бъдат добавени към стая с роля {{roleName}} като максимум.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "успешно" is placed awkwardly at the end of the sentence. It's grammatically correct, but the flow could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Въпреки това, можете да промените ролята на отделните потребители в групата, след като тя бъде добавена успешно.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role as maximum" is not perfectly translated. The Czech translation "Skupiny lze do místnosti přidat maximálně s rolí {{roleName}}" implies that only groups with the given role can be added. A more accurate translation would convey the limit on the maximum role allowed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupiny lze do místnosti přidat, maximální povolená role je {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "zum Raum hinzugefügt werden" is not the most natural way to express 'added to a room' in German. A more idiomatic phrasing would be 'in den Raum hinzugefügt werden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gruppen können maximal mit der Rolle {{roleName}} in den Raum hinzugefügt werden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation lacks a space after the colon in 'Ωστόσο:'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ωστόσο :

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'της' after 'προσθήκη' is unnecessary and makes the sentence slightly awkward. It refers to the group, but it's implied.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μπορούν να προστεθούν ομάδες σε ένα δωμάτιο με τον ρόλο {{roleName}} ως μέγιστο. Ωστόσο, μπορείτε να αλλάξετε τον ρόλο μεμονωμένων χρηστών στην ομάδα μετά την επιτυχή προσθήκη.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Maksimimäärän ryhmiä voi nyt lisätä huoneeseen {{roleName}}-roolissa" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role as maximum." It literally translates to "A maximum number of groups can now be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role."  It implies a limit on the *number* of groups, not the role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ryhmiä voi lisätä huoneeseen {{roleName}}-roolilla. (Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, "Voit kuitenkin muuttaa yksittäisten käyttäjien rooleja ryhmässä sen jälkeen, kun se on lisätty." is a bit clunky. The use of "sen jälkeen, kun se on lisätty" is a bit passive and could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit kuitenkin muuttaa yksittäisten käyttäjien rooleja ryhmässä lisäyksen jälkeen. (You can however change the roles of individual users in the group after adding.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Les groupes peuvent être ajoutés à une salle avec le rôle {{roleName}} comme maximum" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the maximum allowed role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les groupes peuvent être ajoutés à une salle avec le rôle {{roleName}} comme rôle maximum autorisé.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "une fois que celui-ci a été ajouté avec succès" is a bit verbose.  'Celui-ci' refers to the group, but is slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: une fois le groupe ajouté avec succès.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "դերն է" is grammatically awkward. It translates to 'is the role' which isn't the most natural way to express the maximum allowed role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: դերն է թույլատրված

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "առանձին օգտատերերի դերը խմբում" is a bit convoluted. A more natural phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: խմբի անդամների դերը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "այն ​​հաջողությամբ ավելացնելուց հետո:" is a bit clunky due to the extra space in "այն ​​".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: այն հաջողությամբ ավելացնելուց հետո:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation uses a period (.) after 'massimo' instead of a comma (,), which is standard in Italian for listing limitations. It disrupts the flow and sounds less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: I gruppi possono essere aggiunti a una stanza con al massimo, il ruolo {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "役割を最大として" (as maximum role) is a bit unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing would indicate a limit or restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: グループは{{roleName}}以下の役割を持つユーザーとしてルームに追加することができます。(Groups can be added to a room with users having {{roleName}} or lower roles.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The entire phrasing is a bit stiff and could be more conversational. The overall tone is too formal for an informational message in a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームには{{roleName}}のロールを持つユーザーまでグループを追加できます。グループ追加後、個々のユーザーのロールは変更可能です。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "최대 {{roleName}} 역할로 룸에 그룹을 추가할 수 있습니다" could be misinterpreted. A more natural and clearer translation would emphasize the limit *per room*. It currently implies a limit on the role for groups generally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 최대 {{roleName}} 역할까지 룸에 그룹을 추가할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '포함된' in '그룹에 포함된 개별 사용자의 역할을' is slightly awkward. It literally translates to 'included'.  While not incorrect, a more fluent Korean phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 그룹에 포함된 사용자의 역할을

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຢ່າງໃດກໍຕາມ" (Yang dai kor tam) is a bit clunky and doesn't flow naturally in this context. It translates to 'however' but a more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "ຢ່າງໃດກໍຕາມ" with a more concise connector like "ແຕ່" (tae) or omitting it entirely.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable `{{roleName}}` is correctly placed but its surrounding whitespace could be improved for consistent readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent spacing around the `{{roleName}}` variable. For example, add a space before and after: `ບົດບາດ {{roleName}} ທີ່ສູງສຸດເທົ່ານັ້ນ`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'maximum' is translated as 'maksimālo'. While technically correct, it feels slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing might emphasize the limit or restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupas var pievienot telpai, pieļaujot maksimālo {{roleName}} lomu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'you can change' is translated as 'jūs varat mainīt'. While correct, it might be more user-friendly to use a more passive phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: varat mainīt atsevišķo lietotāju lomu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'un rol maxim' sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'rolul maxim'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupuri pot fi adăugate la o sală cu rolul maxim {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Cu toate acestea, puteți modifica rolul pentru utilizatori din grup în mod individual odată ce grupul a fost adăugat cu succes' is a bit long and could be simplified. The phrase 'în mod individual' is redundant as 'pentru utilizatori' already implies individual modification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cu toate acestea, puteți modifica rolul utilizatorilor din grup după ce grupul a fost adăugat cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Groups can be added to a room with the {{roleName}} role as maximum' is not perfectly translated. The Russian translation 'Группы можно добавлять в комнату с максимальной ролью {{roleName}}' sounds a bit awkward. A more natural translation would incorporate the idea of a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Группы можно добавлять в комнату с ролью {{roleName}} в качестве максимальной.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The spacing after the colon in the key name 'InviteDialog:GroupMaxAvailableRoleWarning' is unnecessary in Russian translations; this is a stylistic point.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed in the translated text, but consider aligning key naming conventions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'කාමරයකට' (kamaranakata) is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයට (kamaraya)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'පරිශීලක කණ්ඩායම් {{roleName}} භූමිකාව සහිතව උපරිම වශයෙන් කාමරයකට එකතු කළ හැකිය' is a bit long and complex. It could be split or restructured for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලක කණ්ඩායම් {{roleName}} භූමිකාව දක්වා කාමරයකට එකතු කළ හැකිය. (Parishilaka kandayama {{roleName}} bhoomikava dakka kamarayakata ekathu kala adiyak) - Groups can be added to a room up to the {{roleName}} role.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "maximálnou rolou" is awkward. A more natural Slovak phrasing would be "rolou {{roleName}}" or "rolou s názvom {{roleName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupiny je možné pridať do miestnosti s rolou {{roleName}}. Alternatively: Skupiny je možné pridať do miestnosti s rolou s názvom {{roleName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure is a little clunky. Separating the two sentences improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupiny je možné pridať do miestnosti s rolou {{roleName}}. Po úspešnom pridaní skupiny môžete zmeniť rolu jednotlivých používateľov v skupine.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Skupine se lahko dodaja" is grammatically incorrect. It should be "Skupine se lahko dodajajo" to agree with the plural 'Groups'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skupine se lahko dodajajo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation maintains the `{{roleName}}` placeholder. It's important to ensure this placeholder is handled correctly in the target locale's implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No direct correction, but ensure placeholder handling is consistent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The comma after 'Међутим' should be a period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Међутим . could be changed to Међутим.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Grupe se mogu dodati u prostoriju sa {{roleName}} ulogom kao maksimum' is a bit clunky. 'Maksimum' is not the most natural way to express the limit in this context. It sounds more like a technical term being directly translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupe se mogu dodati u prostoriju sa {{roleName}} ulogom kao najvišom dozvođenom ili Grupe se mogu dodati u prostoriju uz {{roleName}} ulogu kao ograničenje.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Međutim, možete promeniti ulogu pojedinačnih korisnika u grupi nakon uspešnog dodavanja.' is grammatically correct but could be slightly improved for flow. The word 'poredinačnih' is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Međutim, možete promeniti ulogu korisnika u grupi nakon uspešnog dodavanja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "з максимальною роллю" (with maximum role) is a slightly awkward translation. It's understandable but doesn't flow as naturally as it could.  A more natural phrasing would imply a limit, not a fixed assignment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: з максимально допустимою роллю

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'після її успішного додавання' translates literally to 'after its successful adding.'  While grammatically correct, in Ukrainian, it is more natural to say 'після успішного додавання' (after successful addition).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: після успішного додавання

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "可以将群组添加到房间，最大角色为{{roleName}}。但是，成功添加群组后，您可以更改群组中各个用户的角色。" is a bit literal and could be more natural-sounding. Specifically, '可以将群组添加到房间' feels clunky.  A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of '群组可以添加到房间'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 群组可以添加到房间，最大角色为{{roleName}}。但是，成功添加群组后，您可以更改群组中各个用户的角色。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The full stop (句号) follows '角色为{{roleName}}', which is a bit abrupt. It would flow better with a slightly longer pause indicated by an em dash or a comma, especially considering the subsequent explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 群组可以添加到房间，最大角色为{{roleName}}—但是，成功添加群组后，您可以更改群组中各个用户的角色。
